description:
HandBrake 1.8 open-source and free video transcoding application is now available for download with a GTK4 port for Linux users, as well as numerous other new features and enhancements.

The post HandBrake 1.8 Video Transcoder Adds GTK4 Port on Linux, FFmpeg 7.0 Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: HandBrake 1.8 Video Transcoder Adds GTK4 Port on Linux, FFmpeg 7.0 Support

description:
IceWM 3.5 lightweight window manager is now available for download with new features, options, commands, improvements, and bug fixes. Here's what's new!

The post IceWM 3.5 Lightweight Window Manager Released with New Features appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: IceWM 3.5 Lightweight Window Manager Released with New Features

description:
fwupd 1.9.20 Linux firmware updater is now available for download with support for FPC FF2 fingerprint devices and a couple of new features. Here's what's new!

The post Fwupd 1.9.20 Firmware Updater Adds Support for FPC FF2 Fingerprint Devices appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fwupd 1.9.20 Firmware Updater Adds Support for FPC FF2 Fingerprint Devices

description:
MX Linux 23.3 distribution is now available for download based on Debian GNU/Linux 12.5 “Bookworm” and featuring Linux kernel 6.8 for the AHS (Advanced Hardware Support) edition.

The post MX Linux 23.3 “Libretto” Released with Linux Kernel 6.8 and Updated Components appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: MX Linux 23.3 “Libretto” Released with Linux Kernel 6.8 and Updated Components
